layout.singingstanza: Look at all the flow -- ers And look at all the trees. Our God is a -- maz -- ing; He cre -- at -- ed all of these. So look at all the flow -- ers And look at all the trees. Our God loves man; He cre -- at -- ed all things. So look at all the flow -- ers And let's look at all the trees. Our God loves man; All things are for ME!!
layout.singingstanza2: 2. Look at all the flow -- ers And look at all the trees. My God is a -- maz -- ing; He cre -- at -- ed them for me. So look at all the flow -- ers And look at all the trees. My God loves me; He cre -- at -- ed all things.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2013 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza:
Look at all the flowers And look at all the trees. Our God is amazing; He created all of these.
So look at all the flowers And look at all the trees. Our God loves man; He created all things.

Look at all the flowers And look at all the trees. My God is amazing; He created them for me.
So look at all the flowers And look at all the trees. My God loves me; He created all things.
Ending: So look at all the flowers And let's look at all the trees. Our God loves man; All things are for ME!!
